summary: Results-driven Full-Stack Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience building scalable web applications and cloud-native solutions. Expert in React, Node.js, and AWS with a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact products. Passionate about clean code, system design, and mentoring junior developers. Successfully reduced application load time by 65% and increased user engagement by 40% through strategic technical improvements.

responsibilities: Led development of a microservices-based e-commerce platform serving 2M+ users, resulting in 45% increase in conversion rates
Architected and implemented CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Docker, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Mentored team of 5 junior developers, conducting code reviews and technical workshops to improve code quality by 60%
Optimized database queries and implemented Redis caching, improving API response time by 70%
Collaborated with product managers and designers to deliver 15+ features using Agile methodology
Developed and maintained 20+ RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, handling 100K+ daily requests
Built responsive web applications with React and TypeScript, improving mobile user experience by 55%
Implemented automated testing suite with Jest and Cypress, achieving 85% code coverage
Integrated third-party payment systems (Stripe, PayPal) processing $5M+ in annual transactions
Participated in on-call rotation and resolved production incidents with 99.9% uptime SLA
Developed customer-facing features for SaaS platform using React and Redux, serving 50K+ active users
Created data visualization dashboards with D3.js and Chart.js for business analytics
Worked with PostgreSQL databases, writing complex queries and optimizing performance
Collaborated with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect, accessible UI components
Participated in Agile ceremonies and contributed to sprint planning and retrospectives

projects.name: Cloud Task Manager Pro
projects.description: A real-time collaborative task management application with advanced analytics and team collaboration features. Built with modern web technologies and deployed on AWS infrastructure with auto-scaling capabilities.
achievements: Implemented real-time synchronization across devices using WebSocket technology
Achieved 99.99% uptime with AWS ECS and load balancing
Integrated AI-powered task prioritization using TensorFlow.js

projects.name: E-Commerce Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive analytics platform for e-commerce businesses providing real-time insights into sales, customer behavior, and inventory management. Features interactive visualizations and customizable reporting.
achievements: Processed and visualized 10M+ data points with sub-second query performance
Implemented machine learning models for sales forecasting with 92% accuracy
Created customizable dashboard with drag-and-drop widget functionality

projects.name: Open-Source API Gateway
projects.description: High-performance API gateway written in Go with support for rate limiting, authentication, load balancing, and request transformation. Used by 500+ developers worldwide.
achievements: Handles 100K+ requests per second with minimal latency
Featured in popular tech blogs and conference talks
